article1.text: I'm Mat. You may know me from my professional work as a software engineer and user experience designer. Or maybe you came across my personal photography or animation projects. You can also contact me by email and Twitter.

site.label: Professional
site.intro: I'm a skilled front end software engineer and user experience designer, with an eye for detail and mastery of layout, color, and typography fundamentals.
